description: '''Funk''' '''''ousadia''''',{{efn|name="Ousadia"|Loosely translated as "''daring funk''"}} also referred to as '''funk''' '''''picante''''',{{efn|name="Picante"|Loosely translated as "''spicy funk''"}} is a subgenre of the wider [[Funk carioca|Brazilian funk]] scene, originating around 2013 in the city of [[São Paulo]] as an offshoot of the [[Funk ostentação|funk ''ostentação'']] movement. Its lyrical matter is based upon [[Erotica|erotic]]-themed songs with [[double entendre]]s and humorous [[pun]]s.
